generations.inputText:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world.

Tone: informative, friendly

Audience: college students
generations.text: Looking to learn a new language? LangLang is the perfect app for you! With teachers from all around the world, you can learn any language you want, at your own pace.
